div.ab: boats ply on the river to take passengers from Belem Buenos ayres &: to the other end of the city. The opposite coast by Almada is very pretty. Buenos ayres a continuation of Lisbon to the west. Here the houses have gardens. The Palacio Quintellai.e. Palácio Quintela, built in the late 18th century. Had been the headquarters of the French governor of Portugal in 1807. is one of the best in the city. It is a large house with a pretty little garden but excepting fine Tapestry in one room, there seems very little difference between the decorations of the interior and those of the common houses of the town. The Arsenal very spacious, 2,000 men employed in it. The look very magnificent & the academy on a most extensive scale as far as the room goes. The booksellers shops not good.
